#!/bin/ash
# Canvas Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
PROJECT=Canvas

# Only download from the specified URL
DOWNLOAD_URL="https://canvasmc.io/api/latest"

cd /mnt/server

echo -e "Downloading JAR from ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"

# If the server jar already exists, move it to an old file
if [ -f ${SERVER_JARFILE} ]; then
    mv ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${SERVER_JARFILE}.old
fi

# Download the latest JAR with proper options
curl -L -C - -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${DOWNLOAD_URL}

# Check if the download is successful and file size is valid
if [ ! -f ${SERVER_JARFILE} ] || [ $(stat -c %s ${SERVER_JARFILE}) -lt 1000 ]; then
    echo "Download failed or file is too small. Please check the URL or server response."
    exit 1
fi

# If server.properties does not exist, download it
if [ ! -f server.properties ]; then
    echo -e "Downloading MC server.properties"
    curl -o server.properties https://sneakyhub.com/files/server.properties
fi
